briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate the Safety of Rosuvastatin in Children and Adolescents With Homozygous Familial Hypercholesterolemia
officialTitle: An Open-Label Long-Term Extension to the Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Multi-center, Cross-over Study of Rosuvastatin in Children and Adolescents (Aged 6 to <18 Years) With Homozygous Familial Hypercholesterolemia (HoFH)
summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the safety of Rosuvastatin in Children and Adolescents with Homozygous Familial Hypercholesterolemia.

primaryOutcome.measure: The Number of Participants Who Experianced Adverse Events and Serious Adverse Events
